item.title: CmMAF2

item.title: CmMYB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmMYB2 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Regulation of flowering time in chrysanthemum by the R2R3 MYB transcription factor CmMYB2 is associated with changes in gibberellin metabolism.

item.title: PsPIN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsPIN1 Gene Name: auxin efflux carrier protein PIN1 Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: PsPK2 (the gene for a pea homolog of Arabidopsis PID , a regulator of PIN1 targeting), PsPIN1 (the major gene for a putative auxin efflux carrier) and LE (a gibberellin biosynthesis gene, GA3ox ), and also examined mutual hormonal regulation of these genes, in pea shoot tips, including a number of mutants.

item.title: PsPK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsPK2 Gene Name: Pisum sativum serine/threonine protein kinase2 Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: PsPK2 (the gene for a pea homolog of Arabidopsis PID , a regulator of PIN1 targeting), PsPIN1 (the major gene for a putative auxin efflux carrier) and LE (a gibberellin biosynthesis gene, GA3ox ), and also examined mutual hormonal regulation of these genes, in pea shoot tips, including a number of mutants.

item.title: PsRGL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsRGL1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Paeonia suffruticosa Functional Descriptions: PsRGL1 negatively regulates chilling- and gibberellin-induced dormancy release by PsF-box1-mediated targeting for proteolytic degradation in tree peony.

item.title: PtoFT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.010G179700 Gene Symbol: PtoFT2 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T2 Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL 5a (PtoHY5a) modulates FLOWERING LOCUS T2 (PtoHY5a) and gibberellin levels to control dormancy and bud break in poplar.

item.title: PtoHY5a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.018G029500 Gene Symbol: PtoHY5a Gene Name: ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL 5a Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL 5a (PtoHY5a) modulates FLOWERING LOCUS T2 (PtoHY5a) and gibberellin levels to control dormancy and bud break in poplar.

item.title: PtoMYB142
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtoMYB142 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor PtoMYB142 enhances drought tolerance in Populus tomentosa by regulating gibberellin catabolism.

item.title: PvWOX3a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pavir.8KG017200 Gene Symbol: PvWOX3a Gene Name: WUSCHEL-related homeobox transcription factor Genome: Species: Panicum virgatum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of PvWOX3a in switchgrass promotes stem development and increases plant height.
